policyNews.headline: China launches new K-visa for young STEM professionals
policyNews.description: From October 1, 2025 foreign STEM graduates from renowned universities can apply for streamlined 'young-talent' K-visas without employer sponsorship.

policyNews.headline: UK raises Skilled Worker and Global Mobility salary thresholds
policyNews.description: Certificates of Sponsorship issued from 22 July 2025 must meet new salary floors – £41,700 for Skilled Worker and £52,500 for Global Business Mobility.

policyNews.headline: Australia to increase student visa fee to AUD 2,000 from July 2025
policyNews.description: The 25% hike, confirmed by the Department of Home Affairs, is part of broader reforms to control international education volumes and ensure integrity.

policyNews.headline: China–Malaysia 30-day mutual visa exemption takes effect
policyNews.description: From 17 July 2025, nationals of China and Malaysia can travel visa-free for up to 30 days, renewable to 90 days in any 180-day period.

policyNews.headline: Indonesia trims visa categories from 133 to 110 to streamline entry
policyNews.description: Effective 1 June 2025, new regulations merge similar visa types and introduce investor visas for the new capital IKN.
